item.title: Server Timing API
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Leaving myself a note in the form of a few links for the Server Timing API: – W3C Server Timing spec – Mozilla Server Timing – Server Timing as of Chrome 65 This is a method that allows you to include performance related metrics in the HTTP response, using the Server-Timing header. Browsers, like Chrome, […]
item.content:encoded:
Leaving myself a note in the form of a few links for the Server Timing API:

– W3C Server Timing spec
– Mozilla Server Timing
– Server Timing as of Chrome 65

This is a method that allows you to include performance related metrics in the HTTP response, using the Server-Timing header. Browsers, like Chrome, can then display that information as part of the request timing details.
